### To build the binary ``` cat foo.txt | base64 -d | gunzip > foo.elf && chmod +x foo.elf ```
Feel free to ask any questions or share your progress through the challenge.
## References Resources to look into. https://0x00sec.org/t/reverse-engineering-101/1233 by @0x00pf https://web.archive.org/web/20160608095854/http://fluxius.handgrep.se/2011/10/20/the-art-of-elf-analysises-and-exploitations/ https://0xf00i.github.io/2022/05/28/Reverse-engineering-cheat-sheet.html

To build the binary

cat foo.txt | base64 -d | gunzip > foo.elf && chmod +x foo.elf

Feel free to ask any questions or share your progress through the challenge.
